snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Darkmere: The Nightmare's Begun
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played By: Lemm

A very nice RPG from Core Design. The Grafix are first class, espacially no AGA is used. The story hit the spot. But I am sorry to say, that there is no ingame music.
I recorded the intro full. Beware, the intro is 15 mins long and much to read. If you dont want to see it, just skip.

Enjoy... -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
